Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Rabbit's Language
Description: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is spying on a Green Rabbit...
QuestDesc: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is spying on a Green Rabbit...

Conditions.PreQuestName: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Cat's Language

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, nice to see you again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We really have a connection, literally meeting everywhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And for the record, I absolutely didn't follow you! Even though your Pangu Terminal is essential for my research.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I believe in the inevitability of objectivity. Just like the numbers rolled on the dice aren't random; our every encounter is destined by past causes and future consequences.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Doesn't that sound romantic?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, fine. Actually, I'm now observing these Green Rabbits. Did you notice anything special?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly, their tails shed periodically. After shedding, the Green Rabbits will hide away from their original group.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are various interpretations of this behavior. With the translation module, we can probably find out the truth today!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin loads the Rabbit Language Translation Module onto your Pangu Terminal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Green Rabbit with Broken Tail (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sobbing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is this little tailless one crying? Seems like there is a lot happening inside them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Green Rabbit with Broken Tail (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sobbing...

Options.PlotLineKey: Is the translation module malfunctioning again?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, the information transmission is all normal, and no issues were found. How about we try finding some control groups?

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you mean the Green Rabbits with tails?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. Green Rabbits feed on grass or leaves. We can use common plants to attract them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are Pearl Leaves everywhere here. Let's use them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Green Rabbit with Tail (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No tail! Ugly! Ugly!

Options.PlotLineKey: Why do they talk like that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, that's how I set it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't you think it's more interesting and understandable this way?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From a researcher's standpoint, tail loss in Green Rabbits is considered a natural aspect of their metabolism. However, for them, the tail serves as a criterion to distinguish beauty from ugliness. Quite intriguing.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are rabbits also concerned about appearances?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All animals want to "select high-quality mates," as it serves as a form of survival strategy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Green Rabbits feed on grass and their tail glands play an important role in metabolizing toxins. When toxins accumulate to a certain extent, it manifests as "tail loss."

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I didn't anticipate that they would be so disheartened because of this reason...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, when I was optimizing the module, I introduced human thinking logic to it this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And! I, myself, am the sampler of human thinking logic. Don't you think the translation is more vivid?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xuanyin uninstalls the Rabbit Language Translation Module from your Pangu Terminal and transmits the related data back to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Farewell! I'll go back to write the report. See you next time!
